root.name: Call of Duty: Ghosts
root.description: OverviewCall Of Duty: Ghosts is the tenth installment in the Call Of Duty series developed by Infinity Ward, Neversoft Entertainment, Raven Software, and Treyarch. The game is set to release on 6 different platforms and is Call of Duty's debut on the Xbox One and PS4. The game is running on a brand new engine on next generation consoles.The story-line of Call of Duty: Ghosts concerns a new story in which the United States has been devastated in multiple ways by "The Federation", a South American military group based in Caracas, Venezuela, who after conquering all of South America, then made their advance towards the US. The "Ghosts" team is made up of the remnants of the country's special forces teams.New Features to Call Of DutyNew Leaning - Players will be able to lean around walls and corners.Diving introduced - Similar to Black Ops but will cause you to slide along the floor.Dynamic Maps - Events such as earthquakes and floods will happen mid-game.Player driven events - players can trigger explosive traps, falling logs etc.Character customization - Includes custom body armor, gear, equipment, helmet.
